title: Interaction File Downloaded Event Data
description: Data payload for the interaction.file_downloaded event. Fired when a user initiates a file download.

fileName.description: The name of the downloaded file.

fileExtension.description: The file extension, e.g. pdf, csv, xlsx.

fileUrl.description: The URL from which the file was downloaded.

fileCategory.description: The category of the file, e.g. document, image, video.
